properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME , SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) ORDER BY EMP_ID DESC
SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME , SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) WHERE DEPT_TITLE = ? ORDER BY EMP_ID DESC
